subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Terrapins Coach Mark Turgeon improved to 6-0 in his career against the Cyclones. Arizona won its first close game of the season, beating Kansas State at the Maui Invitational.
snippet: Terrapins Coach Mark Turgeon improved to 6-0 in his career against the Cyclones. Arizona won its first close game of the season, beating Kansas State at the Maui Invitational.
